title: Getting Started with NoBo
content:
Getting Started

NoBo is designed to be simple and intuitive. Here's how to get started with your new site:

1. Access the Admin Dashboard

Visit /admin to access your admin dashboard. Use the credentials from your content/config.json file to log in.

2. Create Your First Post

In the admin dashboard, click "New Post" to create your first blog post. You can use the Gutenberg block editor to format your content.

3. Customize Your Theme

All themes are stored in the content/themes/ directory. You can modify the default theme or create your own.

4. Add Plugins

Plugins go in the content/plugins/ directory and can extend NoBo's functionality.

// Example: Building your site
npm run build
npm run export
